additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Front of Pack: Calcium Carbonate 780mg, Magnesium Carbonate Hydrate 130mg, Magnesium Trisilicate 130mg Rapid Relief Heartburn and Acid Indigestion Back of Pack: Active Ingredients Per Tablet: Calcium Carbonate 780mg, Magnesium Carbonate Hydrate 130mg, Magnesium Trisilicate 130mg Use: for Temporary Relief from Heartburn and Indigestion. Warnings: Not Suitable for Children Under 6 Or Patients With Impaired Kidney Function. Seek Medical Advice If Symptoms Persist Or for Continuous Use Beyond 2 Weeks, Or If Taking Other Medication. If Pregnant, Do Not Exceed the Recommended Dose Unless Under Medical Supervision. Contains Sugars. Directions for Use: Chew 1-4 Tablets As Required. Maximum Daily Dose: Adults 12 Tablets, Children (6-12 Years) 6 Tablets. Other Information: Store Below 30c in A Dry Place. Do Not Use If Pack is Damaged Or Appears To Have Been Tampered With.
